property.value: A leader engagment in Paktika province

note.text: In rural areas with no clear government presence, identifying authority figures might be difficult. While elders or elected leaders may be present, there may be insurgent influencers who don't want to be identified.

Start by speaking to trusted counterparts and reviewing past engagements. Brief your interpreter before meetings, as they will likely understand Afghan group dynamics better than you. After the meeting, ask your interpreter for input if you have had trouble identifying power brokers.
